titleStmt.title: Queene El'zabeths losse, and King Iames his vvelcome
Elizaes losse, and King James his welcome
titleStmt.author: H. S., fl. 1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for Iohn Smythicke, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Saint Dunstons Church-yard in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Elizaes losse, and King Iames his welcome.
Another edition of "Elizaes losse" with additions.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Saint Dunstons Church-yard in Fleetstreete
